LookAtWebcam.success_prompt: Sum up what is seen in the webcam image.

examples.user: What are you seeing right now?
Look what is in my hand right now.
Can you see what I am holding in my hand right now?

LookAtDesktop.success_prompt: Sum up what is seen in the desktop screenshot.

examples.user: What can you see on my PC?
Look what's going on at my PC.
